attributes.action: require the chancellor to resign and fully support a criminal investigation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Time after time we here of HMRC loosing data and being less than competent with data protection. It is time for the buck to stop at the top and furthermore support the Police in a criminal investigation as to breaches of the data protection act that binds all those outside government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
